name: Space Demo
description:
Solve puzzles with objects around you in space! Float around and throw chairs, barrels and more!

Please note this is a demo of a very early prototype and so it may be changed extensively. Any feedback at all would be greatly appreciated!

WASD and mouse for movement. Use your mouse to throw objects. Drop and pickup objects with E.

Interact with the terminal computers to flip gravity! Make sure you get a jetpack as well, so you can move in 0G.
